heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Control of Fishing for Salmon
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Control of Fishing for Salmon 

(Amendment) Order 2025.

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1977 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. In this Order “Order of 2021” means the Control of Fishing for Salmon
text_raw:
2. In this Order “Order of 2021” means the Control of Fishing for Salmon 

Order 2021 (S.I. No. 102 of 2021).
text_norm: 2 order order 2021 mean control fishing salmon order 2021 (s.i no 102 2021)

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1977 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. The Order of 2021 is amended –
text_raw:
3. The Order of 2021 is amended – 

(a) 

by the substitution of Schedule 1 to this Order for Schedule 1 to 
the Order of 2021, 

and 

(b) by the substitution of Schedule 2 to this Order for Schedule 2 to 

the Order of 2021. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th March, 2025.

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1977 (S.I. No.
heading: Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons
text_raw:
1. 

Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons 

(a) 

(b) 

If you held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the last 3 
salmon fishing seasons, indicate in the table below the year or 
years in which you held the licence and the numbers of fish 
caught. Alternatively, you may tick the box at the top of the table 
for the number of fish caught and IFI will enter these details onto 
the form from your logbook returns during those years. 

If you have not held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the 
last 3 salmon fishing seasons, but were authorised and named on 
a licence held by another person, complete the table below giving 
appropriate details of the licence holder and the number of fish 
caught. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [72] 5 

Table 

Please tick if you wish these details to be 
taken from your logbook returns. 

( ) 

Year Licence holder or authorised person 

(Please state which) 

Number of salmon 
caught 

Number of sea trout 
over 40cm caught 

1 

2 

3

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1977 (S.I. No.
heading: Declaration
text_raw:
2. 

Declaration 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

I have/have not held a salmon licence issued by the Foyle 
Carlingford and Irish Lights Commission during the last 3 years 
(If so, give particulars). 

I hereby apply for a salmon fishing licence to operate a 
___________________ (state type of net etc.) during the 
_____________________ season in the ______________ fishery 
district. 

I wish to have the following person authorised and named to 
operate the licence in my absence during the ____________ 
season in accordance with the Control of Fishing for Salmon 
(Amendment) Order 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [72] 

Name: _________________________ Date of birth: ______________ 

Address:__________________________________________________ 

Tel. No.:_________________________ 

Signature of applicant:_________________ Date:_________________ 

Part 2 

CERTIFICATE 

This certificate must be completed in every application. 

I, ____________________ certify that Mr/Mrs/Ms ______________________ 

who is known to me, is ordinarily resident in the address stated in Part I and 
signed this form in my presence. 

Signature: _______________________ 

Official Stamp of 

* Position: _______________________ 

Witness* 

Address: ________________________ 

_______________________________ 

*Note: The signature of the applicant for a fishing licence must be witnessed by 
either a Peace Commissioner, Clergyman, Fishery Officer, or member of the 
Garda Síochána in whose fishery district the applicant resides. The latest date 
for receipt of completed application forms is 10th April 2025 at 5:00 p.m. 
Completed application forms should be sent to: 

River Basin District Director, 

Inland Fisheries Ireland 

_______________________________ 

_______________________________ 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 PARTS I AND 2 OF THIS APPLICATION FORM MUST BE COMPLETED 
BEFORE THE FORM IS RETURNED TO THE APPPOPRIATE IFI OFFICE 
AT THE ADDRESS INDICATED IN PART 3. PLEASE ATTACH BIRTH 
CERTIFICATE OF APPLICANT AND IF APPLICABLE, OF PERSON 
AUTHORISED TO OPERATE THE LICENCE.
